title: The handwriting you wish was yours is mine.
content: Blatant bit of self-publicity; I was pleased to see Olicana featured in Fontshop's [Top type of 2009](http://web.archive.org/web/20100128115300/http:/www.fontshop.com/blog/) under the rather flattering title above. BTW, does anybody have any idea of the meaning of Parseltongue? I don't but I like it.
author: Nick Cooke

comments.content:
Nice work, Nick!

Olicana is a beauty. And parceltongue is from Harry Potter books; if I remember correctly, it was the laguage of snakes.
Thanks Tomi, and good luck with Suomi Hand – I'm sure it will replace Olicana in next year's list. And thanks for the info.
Thanks, Nick. I'll be keeping my fingers crossed. And thumbs up, which is a Finnish version for the same effect :·)
Congratulations; the recognition is well deserved. Oh, and I love the title of this topic.
